sentences.en: Add mailboxes from other mailbox stores to the current list.
sentences.cn: 将其他邮箱存储中的邮箱添加到当前列表中.

sentences.en: As I lift the mailbox door, I feel its cold iron.
sentences.cn: 掀开邮筒门,顿觉铁寒意.

sentences.en: Everybody in the apartment building went to their mailbox each morning.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨公寓里每个人都去各自的信箱取信.

sentences.en: He dropped the letter in the mailbox.
He stopped at the mailbox and dropped the letter in.
sentences.cn: 他在邮筒前停了下来,把信投了进去.

sentences.en: He stuck down the envelope and dropped it into the mailbox.
sentences.cn: 他把信封粘好后便投进邮筒.

sentences.en: He then dropped both the fire and the ice into the mailbox.
sentences.cn: 他把冰和火一起投进了邮筒.

sentences.en: However, Torvald had promised her not to go near the mailbox until after the Ball.
sentences.cn: 庆幸的是, 托伐答应她舞会结束前不去信箱看信.

sentences.en: I drop the letter into the mailbox in front of the Post Office.
sentences.cn: 我把信塞进邮局前面的邮筒里.

sentences.en: I dropped the letter into the mailbox in front of the Post Office.
sentences.cn: 我把信投进邮局前的邮筒里.

sentences.en: I'd like to check my mailbox and send some e - mails to my friends.
sentences.cn: 我想看看我的电子信箱,还想给朋友发几 封电子邮件.

sentences.en: It allows the filtering of sub - domains, mailbox names and domains.
sentences.cn: 允许子域的过滤, 邮箱命名和领域.

sentences.en: Please, free space in the mailbox or contact server administrator.
sentences.cn: 请清理出邮箱空间或联系服务管理员.

sentences.en: Send the file to my mailbox as soon as you can.
sentences.cn: 请尽快把文件发到我的邮箱.

sentences.en: The prank crammed his mailbox with computer-delivered electronic junk mail.
sentences.cn: 该恶作剧病毒把他的邮箱塞满计算机发送的电子垃圾邮件。

trans.tran_en: a box, usually outside a house, where someone’s letters are delivered or collected
